title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 81.3 - Definitions pertaining to this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 81.3 - Definitions pertaining to this part

State Regulations
A school shall mean any residential facility or institution
providing a program of 24-hour professional care and treatment of mentally
retarded persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
81.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
